subject: Re: [junit] source code for TestRunner
msgSnippet: In the download for JUnit 3.7 there is a file named src.jar. From the command line change the directory to the directory that contains src.jar then type jar
messageBody:
In the download for JUnit 3.7 there is a file named src.jar.

From the command line change the directory to the directory that contains src.jar then type "jar -xvf src.jar" <enter>



Peter Cullinan wrote:

> Does anyone know where I could find the source code for TestRunner, I can
> only find the class files. I am trying to work out how to use reflection to
> extract the methods from the class, before passing them to the run method.
> I guess this is already built into the framework.
>
> Peter Cullinan.
>
